tool.summary: This is a simple to use one step tool to derive the LS Factor of the Universal Soil Loss Equation (USLE) from a Digital Elevatin Model (DEM). It combines DEM preprocessing (sink removal), flow accumulation and specific catchment area (SCA) derivation, slope and final LS factor calculation exposing only the most important options.
